subject: Golf
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: England’s Ken Ferrie equaled the lowest round in European Tour history when he shot a 10-under-par 60 in the Andalucian Open in Málaga, Spain.
snippet: England’s Ken Ferrie equaled the lowest round in European Tour history when he shot a 10-under-par 60 in the Andalucian Open in Málaga, Spain.
